system.requirements:
Tier 3; Per 35, T 35, Survival +10
Aptitudes: Fieldcraft, Perception
Veteran Talent Requirement Fulfilled
system.effect:
Veteran Talent Requirement: Character catches at least three foes unaware in a forest, jungle, or similar area over the course of a single mission
Character treats any cover provided by Dense Foliage, Wooded Forests, and other similar natural environments as having an additional +2 AP to themselves and any allies within 5 metres.
Dense Foliage Cover: Probably 4AP, Trees: 8AP
